    # Configuration

    Customize your PXL Web Vagrant environment by copying config.default.yaml to config.yaml and modify.

    cp config.default.yaml config.yaml

    # config.yaml

    debug: false
timezone: UTC
language-iso: en_US
vm:
    name: pxl-web-vagrant
    ip: 192.168.1.99
    memory: 1024
    cpus: 1
    provision:
        show-command-description: false
        show-command: true
        show-command-output: false
        show-command-execution-time: true
        show-command-exit-code: false
web-servers:
    apache:
        enabled: true
        port: 7001
    nginx:
        enabled: true
        port: 7002
code:
    php:
        versions:
            - 7.3
            - 7.2
            - 7.1
            - 7.0
            - 5.6
        modules:
            - gzip
        cache:
            memcached:
                enabled: true
            apc:
                enabled: true
databases:
    mysql:
        enabled: true
    mongodb:
        enabled: true
cache:
    redis:
        enabled: true
shell:
    tmux:
        enabled: true
        version: 2.8
        tmuxinator:
            enabled: true
        gpakosz:
            enabled: true
    liquidprompt:
        enabled: true

    # Options

    # debug

    Debug mode.

    Default: false

    # timezone

    Vagrant timezone. See available timezones.

    Default: UTC

    # language-iso

    Vagrant language ISO code. See available country codes

    Default: en_US

    # vm

    # name

    Name of Vagrant environment.

    Default: pxl-web-vagrant

    # memory

    Amount of memory usage.

    Default: 1024

    # cpus

    Number of CPU:s used.

    Default: 1

    # provision

    # show-command

    Show executed commands during provision.

    Default: true

    # show-command-execution-time

    Show command execution times during provision.

    Default: true

    # network

    # ip

    The Vagrant environment IP address.

    Default: 192.168.1.99

    # web-servers

    # apache

    # enabled

    Enable Apache.

    Default: true

    # port

    Apache port.

    Default: 7001

    # nginx

    # enabled

    Enable NGINX.

    Default: true

    # port

    NGINX port.

    Default: 7002

    # code

    # php

    # versions

    Specify which PHP versions to install.

    Default:

    - 7.3
- 7.2
- 7.1
- 7.0
- 5.6
    # modules

    Specify which extra PHP modules to install.

    Example:

    - gzip

    # cache

    # memcached
    # enabled

    Enable Memcached.

    Default: true

    # apc
    # enabled

    Enable APC.

    Default: true

    # databases

    # mysql

    # enabled

    Enable MySQL.

    Default: true

    # mongodb

    # enabled

    Enable MongoDB.

    Default: true

    # cache

    # redis

    # enabled

    Enable Redis.

    Default: true

    # shell

    # tmux

    # enabled

    Enable tmux.

    Default: true

    # version

    Specify tmux version.

    Default: 2.8

    # tmuxinator
    # enabled

    Enable tmuxinator.

    Default: true

    # gpakosz
    # enabled

    Enable gpakosz.

    Default: true

    # liquidprompt

    # enabled

    Enable Liquid Prompt.

    Default: true
